member.name: ID3D12Fence.GetCompletedValue
member.summary: Gets the current value of the fence.
member.returns: Returns the current value of the fence. If the device has been removed, the return value will be UINT64_MAX.

member.name: ID3D12Fence.SetEventOnCompletion
member.summary: Specifies an event that's raised when the fence reaches a certain value.
member.param: The fence value when the event is to be signaled.
A handle to the event object.
member.returns: This method returns E_OUTOFMEMORY if the kernel components don’t have sufficient memory to store the event in a list. See Direct3D 12 return codes for other possible return values.

member.name: ID3D12Fence.Signal
member.summary: Sets the fence to the specified value.
member.param: The value to set the fence to.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12Fence
member.summary: Represents a fence, an object used for synchronization of the CPU and one or more GPUs.
